mapper.insert: insert into tissue (piseq,pfilename,pfilesize,pititle,picontent,pistart, piend, ispibook, email, pidate, mygfilename, mymention, myurl) values (piseq_myissue_seq.nextval, #{pfilename}, #{pfilesize}, #{pititle}, #{picontent}, #{pistart}, #{piend}, #{ispibook}, #{email}, sysdate, #{mygfilename}, #{mymention}, #{myurl})
